functions.name: mod_glossary_add_entry

definitionformat.desc: definition format (1 = HTML, 0 = MOODLE, 2 = PLAIN or 4 = MARKDOWN)

name.desc:
The allowed keys (value format) are:
                            inlineattachmentsid (int); the draft file area id for inline attachments
                            attachmentsid (int); the draft file area id for attachments
                            categories (comma separated int); comma separated category ids
                            aliases (comma separated str); comma separated aliases
                            usedynalink (bool); whether the entry should be automatically linked.
                            casesensitive (bool); whether the entry is case sensitive.
                            fullmatch (bool); whether to match whole words only.

value.desc: the value of the option (validated inside the function)

warningcode.desc: the warning code can be used by the client app to implement specific behaviour

message.desc: untranslated english message to explain the warning

functions.description: Add a new entry to a given glossary

functions.name: mod_glossary_delete_entry

warningcode.desc: the warning code can be used by the client app to implement specific behaviour

message.desc: untranslated english message to explain the warning

functions.description: Delete the given entry from the glossary.

includenotapproved.desc: When false, includes self even if all of their entries require approval. When true, also includes authors only having entries pending approval.

warningcode.desc: the warning code can be used by the client app to implement specific behaviour

message.desc: untranslated english message to explain the warning

usedynalink.desc: Whether the category is automatically linked

warningcode.desc: the warning code can be used by the client app to implement specific behaviour

message.desc: untranslated english message to explain the warning

letter.desc: First letter of firstname or lastname, or either keywords: 'ALL' or 'SPECIAL'.

sort.desc: The direction of the order: 'ASC' or 'DESC'

includenotapproved.desc: When false, includes the non-approved entries created by the user. When true, also includes the ones that the user has the permission to approve.

count.desc: The total number of records matching the request.

definitionformat.desc: definition format (1 = HTML, 0 = MOODLE, 2 = PLAIN or 4 = MARKDOWN)

repositorytype.desc: The repository type for external files.

attachment.desc: Whether or not the entry has attachments

repositorytype.desc: The repository type for external files.

teacherentry.desc: The entry was created by a teacher, or equivalent.

usedynalink.desc: Whether the concept should be automatically linked

casesensitive.desc: When true, the matching is case sensitive

fullmatch.desc: When true, the matching is done on full words only

rawname.desc: The raw, unnormalised name for the tag as entered by users.

taginstancecontextid.desc: Context the tag instance belongs to.

flag.desc: Whether the tag is flagged as inappropriate.

canviewall.desc: Whether the user can view all the individual ratings.

canviewany.desc: Whether the user can view aggregate of ratings of others.

name.desc: Scale name (when a real scale is used).

items.desc: Scale items. Only returned for not numerical scales.

canrate.desc: Whether the user can rate the item.

canviewaggregate.desc: Whether the user can view the aggregated grade.

functions.name: mod_glossary_get_glossaries_by_courses

introformat.desc: intro format (1 = HTML, 0 = MOODLE, 2 = PLAIN or 4 = MARKDOWN)

repositorytype.desc: The repository type for external files.

allowduplicatedentries.desc: If enabled, multiple entries can have the same concept name

mainglossary.desc: If enabled this glossary is a main glossary.

showspecial.desc: If enabled, participants can browse the glossary by special characters, such as @ and #

showalphabet.desc: If enabled, participants can browse the glossary by letters of the alphabet

showall.desc: If enabled, participants can browse all entries at once

allowcomments.desc: If enabled, all participants with permission to create comments will be able to add comments to glossary entries

allowprintview.desc: If enabled, students are provided with a link to a printer-friendly version of the glossary. The link is always available to teachers

usedynalink.desc: If site-wide glossary auto-linking has been enabled by an administrator and this checkbox is ticked, the entry will be automatically linked wherever the concept words and phrases appear throughout the rest of the course.

defaultapproval.desc: If set to no, entries require approving by a teacher before they are viewable by everyone.

approvaldisplayformat.desc: When approving glossary items you may wish to use a different display format

rsstype.desc: To enable the RSS feed for this activity, select either concepts with author or concepts without author to be included in the feed

rssarticles.desc: This setting specifies the number of glossary entry concepts to include in the RSS feed. Between 5 and 20 generally acceptable

assesstimestart.desc: Restrict rating to items created after this

assesstimefinish.desc: Restrict rating to items created before this

canaddentry.desc: Whether the user can add a new entry

warningcode.desc: the warning code can be used by the client app to implement specific behaviour

message.desc: untranslated english message to explain the warning

functions.description: Retrieve a list of glossaries from several courses.

attachmentsid.desc: Draft item id for the file manager.

functions.description: Prepares the given entry for edition returning draft item areas and file areas information.

definitionformat.desc: definition format (1 = HTML, 0 = MOODLE, 2 = PLAIN or 4 = MARKDOWN)

name.desc:
The allowed keys (value format) are:
                            inlineattachmentsid (int); the draft file area id for inline attachments
                            attachmentsid (int); the draft file area id for attachments
                            categories (comma separated int); comma separated category ids
                            aliases (comma separated str); comma separated aliases
                            usedynalink (bool); whether the entry should be automatically linked.
                            casesensitive (bool); whether the entry is case sensitive.
                            fullmatch (bool); whether to match whole words only.

value.desc: the value of the option (validated inside the function)
